articles.title: The first direct comparisons suggests SteamOS destroys Windows 11 for gaming - Windows Central
articles.description: The first direct and natively supported comparison between identical Windows 11 and SteamOS gaming hardware is here. And it's pretty much a bloodbath for Microsoft.

articles.description: NVIDIA had RTX 5090 design with four power connectors It looks like an early engineering board.  One thing that should be noted right away is that this is a prototype. We can clearly see all the USB, pin, and connector headers not intended for a retail produc…

articles.title: Curious About iPhone 17 Rumors and Leaks Ahead of WWDC? Here's the Scoop - CNET
articles.description: The big question is how much the next iPhone will actually cost. We have a pretty good guess.

articles.title: I Am Your Beast now available for PS5 - Gematsu
articles.description: Strange Scaffold has released revenge thriller first-person shooter I Am Your Beast for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store for $19.99, the developer announced.
